news.title: Prestige Estates reports 63% increase in sales bookings in FY24
news.para: "Prestige Group achieved a record-breaking sales milestone of Rs 21,040 crore for FY24, marking a growth of 63 per cent year-on-year,"

news.title: NKDA sets up watch team to check encroachment in Kolkata
news.para: “We are trying to develop the team to streamline and strengthen the surveillance process. The teams will oversee all kinds of commercial activities in residential areas to check whether any illegal or unauthorised activity is happening,” said an official.

news.title: Land registration woes plague Cachar, Assam CM intervention sought
news.para: The situation, exacerbated by the absence of deputy registrars and sub-registrars in recent months, has now taken a new turn of distress as the clearance for land transactions from the district commissioner’s office faces delays.

news.title: Phoenix ARC buys two stressed loans from IIFL
news.para: It has offered 15% cash and 85% security receipts for the loans that include one project in Noida and another in Jogeshwari, Mumbai. Phoenix ARC was the only participant in the open auction, the source said.

news.title: Ascott plans to enter co-living space in India
news.para: Ascott, a Singaporean hospitality brand under CapitaLand Investment, aims to venture into India's co-living sector alongside its expansion of serviced apartment offerings in the country.

news.title: Gurugram: NGT bans construction activities in Mayfield Garden
news.para: Mayfield Garden — a residential colony spread over 327 acres across sectors 47, 50, 51, 52 and 57 — has been at the centre of controversy due to gross environmental violations.

news.title: Builders of 30 commercial projects owe over Rs 8,000 crore to Noida authority
news.para: Noida Authority CEO Lokesh M on Thursday held a meeting with builders of commercial projects and sought to know about the hindrances coming in the way of clearing dues.

news.title: Signature Global's sales bookings touches Rs 4,140 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: ​In a regulatory filing, the company informed that it clocked record sales bookings in the fourth quarter as well as in the full 2023-24 that saw sales more than doubling to Rs 7,270 crore from the previous year.

news.title: Co-working firms take on lease 31 lakh sq ft office space in Jan-Mar: CBRE
news.para: In its latest report on the Indian office market, real estate consultant CBRE noted that flexible operators became second largest contributor to the total gross demand for office spaces during the quarter ended March 2024.

news.title: Fundraise by InvITs, REITs surges multi-fold to Rs 17,116 crore in FY24
news.para: ​Going ahead, the outlook for infrastructure investment trusts (InvITs) and real estate investment trusts (REITs) in terms of fundraising for the current fiscal FY25 is very optimistic, industry experts said.

news.title: Illegal constructions mushroom in Navi Mumbai despite court orders
news.para: Recently, the Bombay High Court ordered the demolition of Om Sai Apartments in Ghansoli within eight weeks, holding Cidco and NMMC responsible.

news.title: Macrotech Developers trims debt by 55% to Rs 3,010 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Macrotech Developers' net debt stood at Rs 3,010 crore as of March 31, 2024, down 55 per cent from the previous quarter, according to a regulatory filing.

news.title: Lake buffer zone off-limits for construction in Bengaluru: KTCDA
news.para: After BDA stopped the construction, KTCDA wrote to BDA and BBMP urging the authorities to take strict action to prevent any unauthorised construction near the White Rose Layout. Residents raised the issue last year with the tank authority stating illegal construction and road within Pattandur Agrahara Lake’s buffer zone.

news.title: Gurugram development body asks RWAs to provide details of greenbelts
news.para: The development authority has shared with the RWAs a form and asked them to provide details on the current state of greenbelts in their areas.

news.title: Embassy REIT to acquire business park in Chennai for Rs 1,269 crore
news.para: ​In a regulatory filing, Embassy REIT informed that it has agreed to purchase Embassy Splendid TechZone (ESTZ), a Grade-A business park, from sponsor Embassy Group for an enterprise value of Rs 1,269 crore.

news.title: Bombay HC dismisses plea to stay SRA from acquiring land of a builder
news.para: The slum rehab project on the plot in suburban Mumbai has not taken off for 16 years the HC and said Insolvency law is not meant to be a golden parachute to defeat the socio-welfare provisions of the Slum Act.

news.title: No ownership rights on plots for over 3,300 farmers in Amaravati
news.para: Over 3,300 farmers are yet to get ownership rights of the returnable plots which were allotted on either govt lands, or on lands supposed to be acquired as per the land acquisition procedure.

news.title: HC junks plea against Odisha RERA's execution of orders, fines petitioner
news.para: Bimalendu Pradhan, a resident of Bhubaneswar, filed the petition. According to the order, the petitioner had booked a flat constructed by a real estate firm in Bhubaneswar.

news.title: Jaipur: JDA to charge for completion certificate of buildings over 15 metre in height
news.para: According to the new rule, now a builder has to pay Rs 15 to Rs 30 per square feet of the total size of the building to obtain completion certificate if the height of the under-construction building is more than 15 metre.

news.title: Kolkata civic body targets under-construction illegal buildings
news.para: ​According to plans, KMC sub-assistant engineers in the ward level will identify under-construction illegal buildings under their jurisdiction and upload the same on an app.
